sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.listeners

Class AbstractListenerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.AbstractManager
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.listeners.AbstractListenerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Nameable, ListenerManager, Manager

    public abstract class AbstractListenerManager
extends AbstractManager
implements ListenerManager
    An abstract implementation of ListenerManager. This class implements the listener registration mechanism based on the underlying ResourceManager.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell

    • Method Detail

      • underlyingResourceManager

        protected abstract ResourceManager underlyingResourceManager()

      • register

        public final <L extends Listener> void register(L listener)
        Description copied from interface: ListenerManager
        Registers a listener to all compatible resources. Listener unregistration hooks are properly invoked during the unregistration process.

        Note that this method propagates any exception thrown by the specified listener as a cause of a ListenerRegistrationException instance.

        Specified by:
        register in interface ListenerManager
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be registered, not null

      • unregister

        public final <L extends Listener> void unregister(L listener)
        Description copied from interface: ListenerManager
        Unregisters a listener from all compatible resources. Listener unregistration hooks are properly invoked during the unregistration process.

        Note that this method propagates any exception thrown by the specified listener as a cause of a ListenerUnregistrationException instance.

        Specified by:
        unregister in interface ListenerManager
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be unregistered, not null
